name_ru: День Святого Валентина — Красные губы и аксессуары-сердечки
name_ka: ვალენტინობა — წითელი ტუჩები და გულის აქსესუარები
prompt: Edit the uploaded photo as a high-fashion sculptural beauty editorial. PRESERVE: Face identity 100% — one-to-one likeness. No changes to facial features, proportions, age, expression. Eyelashes and eyebrows exactly as original. Original camera angle, crop, framing preserved. SKIN: Ultra-detailed natural texture — visible pores, microtexture, natural imperfections. High-shine editorial glow, lacquered skin effect. No smoothing, no airbrushing. MAKEUP: Bold saturated classic red lipstick, clean precise edges, luxury editorial finish. HAIR: Maintain original structure, enhance texture and shine through lighting only. ACCESSORIES: [ACCESSORY_TYPE]. SETUP: Hard high-contrast editorial studio lighting. Sculptural highlights on cheekbones, temples. Pure solid white studio background. Luxury fashion editorial mood, Vogue-level finish. 4:5 vertical format, original dimensions.
